channel.title: Code editing
channel.description: Hey, I'm kind of new to this stuff, and I am having some problems with editing some of the codes. Currently, I am using testscape. Whenever I try to edit the code names, I am sure I am doing it right. So I save the client.java, and restart the server. The codes were not changed in anyway and inside client.java still has my edits in it. So basically I am doing it right, it's just not showing up in game. Does anyone know the problem and what I can do to fix this? Thanks in advance.

item.title: Code editing
item.dc:creator: @sirsk8aton sirsk8aton
item.description:
@sirsk8aton wrote:

Actually, I found the problem by myself. The compiler wasn’t working correctly because I didn’t have the right Java installed. Thanks for the suggestions anyway.

This topic can be closed.

Read full topic

item.title: Code editing
item.dc:creator: @W00_W00_NUMA W00 W00 NUMA
item.description:
@W00_W00_NUMA wrote:

listen…this problem can be solved one way…if you look in your data folder in your source…theres client.java and one in the front…like the source folder were it shows all folders. Take the one in data folder replace it with the one thats in there. Should work it worked for me

Read full topic

item.title: Code editing
item.dc:creator: @sirsk8aton sirsk8aton
item.description:
@sirsk8aton wrote:

Actually I’m just going to try a different source, and see if I am still having problems.

Read full topic

item.title: Code editing
item.dc:creator: @freezer_burn freezer burn
item.description:
@freezer_burn wrote:

hmm, i had the same problem when i was editted my phonescape source, but i think you might not be coding correctly try a simple tut and see if it works. make sure everything is correct and do your compiles often.

Read full topic
